name: Monster Knight
description:
This game is an action-adventure game, with a procedurally generated event graph like slay the spire leading to both procedural combat encounters, and dialogue encounters. Start as a weak goblin, gaining perks/mutations as you progress. 

(Currently no end to the game)

Controls

Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

Attack - Left click

Ability - Right Click

Switch Abilities - R/F
